div.p: Smilow Prep does not follow the same inclement weather policy as JPS. In the event school is cancelled or delayed due to weather, every family will receive a phone call. Current information will also be posted on our Facebook and office voicemail.

div.p: Smilow Prep does not follow the same calendar as JPS.
